required_documents: Appointment of Signatory for Incorporation Purposes
missing_documents: Appointment of Signatory for Incorporation Purposes

issues_found.explanation: The document only lists two beneficial owners, but it should also include the personal details and service address for each beneficial owner, as well as passport copies of all current and past nationalities.
issues_found.match_text:
Beneficial Owner: Alice Smith — 60%
Beneficial Owner: Bob Khan — 40%
Signed: Alice Smith
Signed: Bob Khan

issues_found.explanation: The jurisdiction clause in the document states that all disputes shall be referred to UAE local courts. However, for a company incorporated in the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), disputes should be referred to the ADGM Courts.
issues_found.match_text: All disputes shall be referred to UAE local courts.

issues_found.explanation: The date format in the document is not in the format required by ADGM (DD-MM-YYYY).
The registered office address provided is not in the format required by ADGM (Office number, Building name, ADGM).
